name: South Bend Capoeira
notes: South Bend, Indiana. Greg Downey is in Australia and is no longer teaching or playing. The Capoeira List would like to express our deepest sympathy to the family and students of one of the first capoeira instructors in the US, Peg Strain, who died 8 Mar 2014. SOURCE: google 3/13/18, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/126167848
